title: RP?
body: I remember when I first started playing League and received 250 free RP and I also had another account made an also received another 250RP but I was just curious to know is that still a thing or is it over now? Please reply if you know anything about this matter! Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Hey, I remember that too! The RP package for newer accounts has been replaced with a hextech chest and key at level 5.

Let me know if you have any other questions, friend!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iOfonhiP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-05T02:45:56.996+0000)
>
> Hey, I remember that too! The RP package for newer accounts has been replaced with a hextech chest and key at level 5.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions, friend!


Ok well thanks for telling me! I was just very confused about what had happened...
